Author: Lewis Hamilton

Author: Lewis Hamilton

Author: Lewis Hamilton

Author: Lewis Hamilton

Author: Daniel Ricciardo

Author: Daniel Ricciardo

Author: Daniel Ricciardo

Author: Daniel Ricciardo

Quote: I do a bit of Brazilian ju-jitsu when I can. I like a bit of that.
Author: Daniel Ricciardo

Author: Daniel Ricciardo

Author: Daniel Ricciardo

Quote: Music is how I unwind. I love going to see bands or DJs at a festival or a dive bar. My taste is pretty diverse.

Author: Daniel Ricciardo

Author: Daniel Ricciardo

Author: Daniel Ricciardo

Author: Lando Norris

Author: Lando Norris

Quote: Every time I get in the McLaren I feel more comfortable, my confidence increases and I feel more at home with the team.
Author: Lando Norris

Quote: That's one of the biggest things. Never being home, always traveling, having different interests and focusing on different things, just the time aspect of going back home and seeing them, you don't have that at all. It was a big sacrifice but, at the end of the day, it was worth it.

Quote: When I was five - it's not even bad - I stole a sweet from the sweet shop.
Author: Lando Norris

Author: Lando Norris

Quote: I had a much better view with the halo than I expected.
Author: Lando Norris

Quote: I focus on my own job.
Author: Lando Norris

Quote: I am sure there's going to be times when I do things wrong that no one's going to like and everyone's going to think I'm terrible and rubbish but I know I'm going to go through those times, and it's just about understanding that that's going to happen.

Quote: It's what counts, isn't it, on the Sunday, rather than pre-season testing. If you lock up, you do a little mistake, it's nothing, but if you do it on Sunday, you lose a place or you have to box for a flat spot or something like that. It's a much bigger problem.

Quote: I don't know who I would have been if I never watched MotoGP.

Author: Lando Norris

Quote: Sometimes I'm a bit under-aggressive and sometimes a bit over. But I think it's good to have both.
Author: Lando Norris

Quote: I can't remember what made my dad take us karting for the first time, I can't remember really. I was into motorsport by then and I knew everything, and every driver, it was around 2009, 2008. That's when I first properly knew about Formula One. Those were the days.
Author: Lando Norris

Quote: I need to do well and show I'm a worthy driver in F1.

Quote: Having the support from everyone, the bosses, whoever within the team, definitely makes it much easier for me as a driver.
Author: Lando Norris

Quote: In the ideal world, if I was perfect, I'd be able to beat every teammate that I have, in every race.

Author: Lando Norris

Quote: I don't care too much what happened in the past. I prefer to focus on what is coming next and I am really looking forward to it.

Author: Sebastian Vettel

Author: Sebastian Vettel

Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: Whenever I have to do something, I try to minimise the time it takes me to do it. I just cannot wait.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: The track in Abu Dhabi is special; this will be our third Grand Prix there.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: Of course, you always give 100 percent, but at a home race you're always more motivated, simply because you feel at home.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: We have reason to feel good, but it's also a threat to feel too good and I will pay attention that that doesn't happen.

Quote: The bottom line is what we do might not be the safest so there is always some risk but we are ready to take that into account because we love racing and we love motor sports and it is dangerous.

Author: Sebastian Vettel

Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: I have always watched the Race of Champions on TV every year and dreamed about participating one day. It's fantastic to be invited; I'm so happy. To represent Team Germany together with Michael Schumacher is a great honor.

Quote: I come from an ordinary family - my dad is a carpenter, a roof-maker - and we've always loved racing together.

Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: Sometimes you need to press pause to let everything sink in.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: I don't care what other people think as long as I am happy. The day I die or retire, I have blown all my chances because I don't have the chance any more to change my image as an F1 driver.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Author: Sebastian Vettel

Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: Motorsport is very expensive. No one cares if you had a good season two years ago and then you have an injury. It is a very dodgy investment.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: Generally I don't care about what people say. I have to be clear with myself. When everything goes well, people celebrate you, when you make mistakes people criticize you.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: We always kept believing in ourselves and our team and the car.

Quote: As a driver, your target is always to be with the most competitive team possible.

Quote: I remember my first test in F1. After five laps, I came back to the pits and tried to play it cool - 'Oh yeah, I'm fine, I'm on top of this' - but I was completely lost.

Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: There is no such thing as a low risk lap in Monaco. It doesn't exist if you want to be fast, because you have to be on the limit.
Author: Max Verstappen

Quote: I get really tired of all the comments saying I should change my approach.
Author: Max Verstappen

Quote: I never even think of the mental side of things because I never had any issues.
Author: Max Verstappen

Quote: It's just racing. Sometimes you have difficult moments, and then you try to work hard, and you keep working hard, and you overcome the situation. It's as simple as that.
Author: Max Verstappen

Quote: In general, the spotlight has been on me.
Author: Max Verstappen

Quote: It is not because others tell me I have to change my driving style that I will change.
Author: Max Verstappen

Quote: Overtaking is one thing. That is an art. But defending as well. You should be able to defend your position.
Author: Max Verstappen

Quote: I did like history. I was always quite interested and got good grades as well.
Author: Max Verstappen

Quote: I always wanted to be a racing driver. Even if it was not F1, it would be something else.
Author: Max Verstappen

Quote: It doesn't matter as long as, at one point, I'm in a championship-winning car. I don't care about my team-mate.
Author: Max Verstappen

Quote: My dad always told me you have to be as quick as you can straight away out of the box. Some people say, 'Feel your way into it; build it up.' No. My dad would say, 'Straight away, you have to be there.' And I think that helps to warm up your tyres and brakes to be on it a bit more from lap one.
Author: Max Verstappen

Quote: I think, in general, not only in Formula One but just in a lot of sports, when younger people come in and they do well, there's always a bit of talk going on. I think that's pretty normal.
Author: Max Verstappen

Quote: If you have God on your side, everything becomes clear.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: Being second is to be the first of the ones who lose.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: I have no idols. I admire work, dedication and competence.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: You will never know the feeling of a driver when winning a race. The helmet hides feelings that cannot be understood.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: Because in a split second, it's gone.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: My biggest error? Something that is to happen yet.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: Because I believe in God and have faith in God, it doesn't mean I am immortal. It doesn't mean I am immune, as has been claimed. I am as scared as anyone of getting hurt, especially driving a Formula One car.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: I continuously go further and further learning about my own limitations, my body limitation, psychological limitations. It's a way of life for me.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: Fear is exciting for me.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: You must take the compromise to win, or else nothing. That means: you race or you do not.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: There are no small accidents on this circuit.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: It's going to be a season with lots of accidents, and I'll risk saying that we'll be lucky if something really serious doesn't happen.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: Of course there are moments that you wonder how long you should be doing it because there are other aspects which are not nice, of this lifestyle. But I just love winning.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: Then suddenly something just kicked me. I kind of woke up and realised that I was in a different atmosphere than you normally are. My immediate reaction was to back off, slow down.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: And so you touch this limit, something happens and you suddenly can go a little bit further. With your mind power, your determination, your instinct, and the experience as well, you can fly very high.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: I am not designed to come second or third. I am designed to win.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: And suddenly I realised that I was no longer driving the car consciously. I was driving it by a kind of instinct, only I was in a different dimension.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: Racing, competing, it's in my blood. It's part of me, it's part of my life; I have been doing it all my life and it stands out above everything else.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: I don't know driving in another way which isn't risky. Each one has to improve himself. Each driver has its limit. My limit is a little bit further than other's.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: Wealthy men can't live in an island that is encircled by poverty. We all breathe the same air. We must give a chance to everyone, at least a basic chance.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: It was like I was in a tunnel. Not only the tunnel under the hotel but the whole circuit was a tunnel. I was just going and going, more and more and more and more. I was way over the limit but still able to find even more.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: The danger sensation is exciting. The challenge is to find new dangers.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: On a given day, a given circumstance, you think you have a limit.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: Women - always in trouble with them, but can't live without them.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: Winning is the most important. Everything is consequence of that.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: These things bring you to reality as to how fragile you are; at the same moment you are doing something that nobody else is able to do. The same moment that you are seen as the best, the fastest and somebody that cannot be touched, you are enormously fragile.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: I was already on pole, then by half a second and then one second and I just kept going. Suddenly I was nearly two seconds faster than anybody else, including my team mate with the same car.
Author: Ayrton Senna

Quote: It doesn't matter how much money you've got, or how many connections, there's always something you want that's out of reach.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: To understand the intensity of driving an F1 car, you have to be in it. When you're driving a 750hp machine at 200mph, the noise and the vibrations are incredible. The G-force when you take big corners is like someone trying to rip your head off. You hit the brakes, and it feels as if the skin is being pulled off your body.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: The fast, flowing parts, the high-speed corners, that's where a Formula One car is at its best - changes of direction, pulling high g-forces left and right.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: To drive an F1 car you have to be a little mad. On the morning of a race there's a mix of excitement and fear. If it's a wet track, then it's worse as you're not in control most of the time, which is the thing all drivers fear the most.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: We go through the whole season working on next season's car and developing the car and making sure we fit in the car and all that sort of stuff. And we obviously give ideas of what we would hope next year's car would have even if it's small things like buttons on the steering wheel and different positions and whatever.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: It is such a special feeling to win a grand prix.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: In my hometown there is a pub named after me - The Frome Flyer on Jenson Avenue. How cool is that?!
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: When it comes to my racing career I'm very driven and very selfish. People who are around me at races will know that I'm a different person here than in my personal life. I completely blank people at races. I need to be focused. I'm rude.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: When you're in a car which can win every race, or fight for a win every race, that is pressure.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I think as a 20-year-old you expect life to always be easy. You get given a good hand and the chance to race in Formula One. You think the driver can make the difference, can make up for everything else within the team. But that is not the case. You are racing in such a competitive sport so that doesn't happen.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: We all drive differently and have different styles. For me I need a car I can develop beneath me and feel comfortable in. If the car feels neutral and unbalanced it doesn't work for me.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I love cycling, running and swimming. In recent years I've competed regularly in triathlons, which means I don't find the physical side of driving a struggle any more.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: When I'm on my own, I can be negative. I need my friends and family around to help pick me up if I've had a bad qualifying session. I think insecurity plagues a lot of sportspeople.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: When I do retire, I know for a fact that I'll never be able to replace the incredible feeling I get when I'm driving an F1 car.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: In the car and in front of the camera I tend to be very calm but behind the scenes I can get fired up and passionate, I just don't see the need to shout my mouth off in public.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I don't purposely speed, but I might go over by five or six miles an hour from time to time. It doesn't give me a buzz driving on normal roads, because I can't go fast enough. It's never going to be anything like an F1 car.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: My 'Movember' moustache was never going to be as big as Nigel Mansell's, but I tried my best. The amazing thing is that when you try to grow a moustache, you notice everyone else's. There are some amazing moustaches on the grid.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I can't eat whatever I want, definitely not. I'm always controlled because I do a lot of fitness and triathlons, not just Formula One, so I always make sure I eat the right things.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: If I ever have a son, and if he wants to follow in my footsteps in Formula 1, my main responsibility will be to point out some of the negatives.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I've spent as much as 30 grand on a watch but it's not about flaunting my wealth. I don't have many extravagances but watches are my biggest one. I must have 30 of them now. I've been collecting since the age of nine, when I won a black TAG in a karting event.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: Yeah, I'm the Brit who isn't Lewis Hamilton that woke up and realised he was good. I got that tag because I was young, flying around in jets and driving fast cars. I always took my driving seriously, but I suppose I enjoyed life... But I'm not a playboy.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I haven't got the yacht any more. The cost of running it was crazy. But it was so much fun while I had it. I don't regret it.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I keep my weight low, although you need to be able to move your weight around the race car to change the balance. I'm 6ft and I'm 70kg so I haven't much fat on me.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: Resting for me is fitness training.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: It doesn't matter who wins if I don't. I only care if I win. I'm jealous of anyone else who wins.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: A lot of people think Formula One isn't a sport because everyone drives a car when they go to work in the morning. But we're pulling up to six G on a corner or during breaking, which is almost like being a fighter pilot. So we have to do a lot of work on our neck muscles.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: My time at Honda was amazing. Some of my best times in Formula One, actually. I might not have won races, just one race, but I had a lot of fun.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I love the role of being the experienced driver and that is definitely the case next year - I think I am the most experienced guy in F1 next year.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I like old tunes when I'm driving. They're fun and uplifting. Billy Ocean, that kind of thing.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: Le Mans' is the only racing movie that is totally realistic.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: You look back and you remember the good, the bad and the ugly.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I have made lots of mistakes in terms of contracts and spending money when I shouldn't have spent money.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I need to develop a car and engineer a car in a position that feels comfortable for me, and I don't think anyone can do a better job than I can in that position. The problem for me is if I can't get the car there I do struggle more than some.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: When I was in Japan with my girlfriend Jessica, she would have had acupuncture every day if she could. I can just about stomach going to a chiropractor and I visited a talented one when I was there, but when he tried a needle on me, it was horrible. My muscles tightened and it didn't work at all.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I always think I should try to get to bed early, but then I can't stop myself from watching telly and fiddling around on the net.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: My school reports always used to point out that my concentration levels were appalling. I never listened in class because I was always daydreaming about racing. I never thought for a moment about doing anything else. There was no guarantee that I'd make a career in it but I never had any plan B.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: If I run I lose so much weight, which I need because you're limited on weight when you are a tall driver. And have you seen marathon runners? They're quite skinny.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: Women don't get the same opportunities that men get in racing, so they don't get to learn race craft.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I think fans of the sport have a good understanding now of how fit Formula One drivers need to be.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I think social networks are really working for the drivers, because we're able to talk directly to fans and they get first-hand information. And I think it's great for the partners as well and the businesses that are involved in Formula One.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: If someone was making a movie about F1 in the last six months, they wouldn't need to add a Hollywood ending. If they do make that movie, it's got to be 'The Curious Case Of Jenson Button,' where I've lived my life backwards. I'd like Johnny Depp to play me but he wouldn't be quite right.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: The only time I think about life beyond F1 is when I contemplate becoming a dad. But there's no way that's going to happen while I'm still racing. To be successful in F1 you need to be very selfish in lots of ways and you're away from home for long periods. That's not the kind of father I want to be.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I felt confident at 24, but I am a better driver now.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: My father did everything for me. He was awesome.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: That Monaco crash was quite a big one - I pulled 33g when I hit the wall, which is a lot. It's a weird sensation - like all my skin and flesh was being pulled off my bones.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I always sleep really well, particularly before a race, when the adrenaline's pumping.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: You're pulling 4-5G for a lot of the corners around the lap. We build up lactic acid because there are a lot of vibrations in the car, and you have to have strong legs to hit the brake pedal. We need to be fit to do every lap at 100%.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: For me, triathlons were something that was down to me and my fitness. Now, I really enjoy the pain in the triathlon of chasing someone down. It's a bit like chasing down Nico Rosberg in the last few laps at Silverstone - it makes you feel alive.
Author: Jenson Button

Quote: I have to take the positives from 2012 and the negatives as well because you learn more than you do from the positives. It has been a great season last year, a lot of learning, and now it's another approach. The way I will approach this year is totally different, so we are ready to fight for it.
Author: Sergio Perez

Quote: Pastor is a driver who doesn't respect other drivers.
Author: Sergio Perez

Quote: As a Formula One driver, you dream about winning your first race all your life. I am desperate to know what it feels like.
Author: Sergio Perez

Quote: Everybody who knows Formula 1 knows McLaren and knows that it is the greatest team in Formula 1.
Author: Sergio Perez

Quote: The facilities are amazing here in McLaren. If you compare them to Sauber, who have good facilities in Formula 1, it's another level. But in terms of the people, the way they approach their jobs, is really amazing when you come into McLaren. The emphasis they have is very good and it gives you a big boost when you drive for this team.
Author: Sergio Perez

Quote: Humility is a super-important factor in all of our lives, and I try to remind myself every evening in front of the mirror, 'Just calm down.'
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: Emotions run high when you have a bad day; you can't hide it.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: Sometimes you are lucky, sometimes you're unlucky. It all weighs out at the end. That is my experience at least.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: We are pushing the limits on the chassis and the engine sides a lot in order to have a competitive car, and this is why we are winning races, but also, if you push the limits at a certain stage, you find them.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: We must be relentless and resilient.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: By admitting a mistake, it is easier to get yourself out of a spiral.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: People enjoy watching sports at the weekend and watching motor racing and whatever sports, and Formula One is the number one global platform which is competing regularly - not like the Olympic Games or the World Cup - so the macro case was this is something that we should be part of because it's going to grow, and it does.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: It is important for a racing driver, for myself and for the team, that we can say that we trust each other, and it is not lightly said.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: You have seen in football that if you start to think you are the 'Special One,' or that you are better than the others, that is the moment when you will be beaten.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: Winning races is very difficult - actually, it's not: you just have to qualify in front, and then it's much easier, from what we've analysed!
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: I think, as a tire manufacturer, you need to deliver a product that, up to a certain specification, needs to hold the loads and the speed. But you want a tire which degrades in performance so the races are not boring, while at the same time, you want it to have peak performance. All together is a very difficult task.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: This is motor racing, and things can change pretty quickly.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: If a no-deal Brexit would happen like has been discussed, I think we would have a major impact in terms of our operations going to the races and getting our cars developed and ready.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: I've been involved in motorsports from the commercial point of view for many years with my involvement with DTM and managing other businesses, such as a rally business as well where we are collaborating with Red Bull.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: Marchionne has a clear vision of what F1 should represent for Ferrari, which is a purist sport that isn't a shopping channel. I would strongly encourage the sport's stakeholders not to provoke him.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: I'm open-minded.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: I'm always on the worrying side.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: I live part of the time in Oxford, and I love it.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: If you come into Formula 1, and you try to eat each other or perform on the highest level, and equalisation is what you need after the first race, and you cry out after the first race, it's not how we've done things in the past and not how we've moaned.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: We are all racers at heart, and what we want to see is out and out racing, and may the quickest man win.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: You need the right balance between data and gut feeling.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: Every team can have a shot at the title, and we're seeing all of them as a potential threat. There's absolutely no feeling of entitlement to be at the front.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: The downfall of any leader in a sport's team is when he gets carried away with his own ego.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: F1 needs Ferrari much more than Ferrari needs F1.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: I was raised by my mother. My father died when I was 15. He was just 41.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: Brexit is a major concern for us, and it should be a major concern for all of us who live in the U.K. and operate out of the U.K.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: A restructuring of an organisation is always a difficult time and delicate.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: I'm getting to enjoy the mentality of the British, the sarcasm, the dry humour. There are so many more ways of articulating yourself than in German.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: This is motor racing. We go at very high speeds, and tires have always been deflating or exploding. It is just part of the sport.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: We have a strict radio protocol and structure how our decisions are made. This is how we've won so many races.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: The combination between the speed, personality, and being able to temper your emotions in both directions is a great ingredient.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: The way we are getting parts and services is just in time, at the last minute, into the U.K., and any major disruption in borders and taxes would massively damage the Formula One industry in the U.K.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: Don't mess with Sergio Marchionne.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: We are always full of the types of people who retire or die. But they are never saying 'This guy is really unbelievable; we're alive to witness an exceptional performer.' I think we should recognise that while we are still racing.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: In terms of the sport itself, I think we need to stop talking ourselves down.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: I was much too late when I found out about my passion for motor racing. I was 18.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: You cannot expect a driver who has just lost a shot at pole position to run around with a smile on his face. You need to accept that he is upset in a different way to how we are upset.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: We appreciate every rational and every true comment, and we take criticism very seriously.
Author: Toto Wolff

Quote: I hate wearing trousers and shoes. I wear jeans and sneakers most of the time.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: Formula one is very one-dimensional in terms of what we do in the cockpit.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: For me to train and get ready for racing, I can't just sit in the gym all the time and that's the way it is. Responsibility starts and stops with me. My main gig is grand prix driving, that's what I do and I need to keep that in the forefront of my mind.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: I am healthy, my family is healthy. That is the important thing. After that we go racing.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: I love driving at Monaco but the rest of it, well, I can absolutely take it or leave it. It's extremely pretentious and really not my cup of tea.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: Red Bull are backing a spinal-injury research charity called Wings For Life, which I am an ambassador for, with a programme called Faces for Charity that will run at this year's British Grand Prix.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: When I'm driving I should make more of an effort with my iPod, but I'm too lazy to organise a playlist.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: You know, when my dad was a racing fan in Australia he would follow Jack Brabham and sometimes only hear if he won two days after a race - when the result finally appeared in his newspaper. These days I can tweet something and it's all over the world in seconds.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: Cycling keeps me lean and I need to stay in shape, especially as I still like eating chocolate and ice-cream! I like to go mountain biking too. Running is also good; it's what we were designed to do as humans, so it comes naturally.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: My mother and I took over abandoned buildings to sleep in.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: Only one guy can be world champion, and so if everyone else thought they were failures you'd have no one left on the grid.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: We don't get groupies, well I don't see them, anyway. That was something that I always looked forward to and am constantly disappointed by the lack of!
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: Winning in Monaco is always special. That track has always been good to me. I won there in Formula 3000, battled for the victory with Williams in 2006 and now I've won two of the last three grands prix there.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: Sitting beside the pool is fine for two weeks, but after that I think it'd be quite hard to live with - so I need to keep racing.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: I would love to be better at cooking but I hate cleaning up afterwards. I love the process of putting everything together and the chance of getting it right or wrong but it takes ten minutes to eat it and then ages to clean.
Author: Mark Webber

Quote: You can't change what happened. But you can still change what will happen.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: I don't care too much what happened in the past. I prefer to focus on what is coming next and I am really looking forward to it.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: There are some things that you can fulfil with money, but at the end of the day these are not the things that make you happy. It is the small things that make life good.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: If the boat started shaking, we stayed on course and didn't lose focus. That made the difference.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: I put everything in that last lap, it was very emotional when I crossed the line. It was all I had, I gave it all.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: You can't always say what you'd like to say.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: You're traveling all over the world but to be home is something special.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: There are a few things that make me angry. Mostly things not going my way.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: It's a tricky place, especially the last sector. I wasn't happy in practice. I wasn't happy with the car and I wasn't happy with myself. But I always thought there was more in the car.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: Whenever I have to do something, I try to minimise the time it takes me to do it. I just cannot wait.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: The track in Abu Dhabi is special; this will be our third Grand Prix there.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: Of course, you always give 100 percent, but at a home race you're always more motivated, simply because you feel at home.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: We have reason to feel good, but it's also a threat to feel too good and I will pay attention that that doesn't happen.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: The bottom line is what we do might not be the safest so there is always some risk but we are ready to take that into account because we love racing and we love motor sports and it is dangerous.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: Driving at high speed where safe and legal is part of my life. As well as a higher top speed I wanted even better stability in my FX and that meant work on the aerodynamics.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: If you are out in two races and someone else has a good couple of races, it could change. So all we do is try to get the optimum every time.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: All in all it was a smooth race, the car was very well balanced. I'm very proud to be the first winner here in India.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: I'm very proud to be the first winner of the Indian Grand Prix, but then on the other hand we recently lost two of our mates. I didn't know Dan Wheldon, but he was big in motorsport, and then this year I got to know Marco Simoncelli, so our thoughts are with them at the moment.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: I have always watched the Race of Champions on TV every year and dreamed about participating one day. It's fantastic to be invited; I'm so happy. To represent Team Germany together with Michael Schumacher is a great honor.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: I come from an ordinary family - my dad is a carpenter, a roof-maker - and we've always loved racing together.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: All these nice people saying I'm going to be world champion won't make me any faster, you have to believe it yourself.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: Sometimes you need to press pause to let everything sink in.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: I don't care what other people think as long as I am happy. The day I die or retire, I have blown all my chances because I don't have the chance any more to change my image as an F1 driver.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: At the end of your life, it's friendships, emotions and thoughts that you take with you, rather than what's in your bank account. So, even though people don't have a lot here, they are a lot richer in many ways and we can learn from that.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: When I went into the last lap I was regretting a bit that it was over. I was enjoying again the first sector for the last time. Simply fantastic this circuit, and if you get 53 laps more, you appreciate it even more. It's made by God's hands.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: Motorsport is very expensive. No one cares if you had a good season two years ago and then you have an injury. It is a very dodgy investment.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: Generally I don't care about what people say. I have to be clear with myself. When everything goes well, people celebrate you, when you make mistakes people criticize you.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: We always kept believing in ourselves and our team and the car.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: When you walk the track and you see a corner and realise you were going round it at 160mph, you wonder who could be so stupid to take a corner at that speed. But in the car, you don't even think about that.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: As a driver, your target is always to be with the most competitive team possible.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: I was quite emotional when I finished my lap, but had to wait for other drivers to cross the line to hear whether I'd actually done it. It feels very special, but I acknowledge that the old master, Nigel Mansell, took his 14 poles from only 16 races.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: It was an unbelievable experience! The brakes, the g-forces and the power of the engine are beyond description. Thanks to BMW and WilliamsF1 for giving me this chance to test. The test team looked after me brilliantly and I learnt plenty.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: Teams like Ferrari, McLaren and Mercedes are going to be very, very motivated to go for the titles.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: After 10 weeks away from Formula One, when they started the engine here at Valencia and everything was vibrating, I found myself sitting in the RB7 and smiling.
Author: Sebastian Vettel

Quote: We get paid based on where we are in the Constructors' Championship so therefore we want the fastest and best drivers we can get in the car.
Author: Christian Horner

Quote: I think one thing Liberty finds frustrating is a lot of this business is conducted through the media. That's something they're not used to with American sport. Author: Christian Horner

Quote: To win, or to create a great group with winning mentality, you need first stability, but serenity as well. And it is only by creating an internal and mutual trust that you can achieve it.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: People should judge me for what I've done in 25 years. I'm not a rookie in F1.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: F1, we have all sorts of teams with different characteristics. They operate in different countries, under different legislation and with their own ways of working.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: One should not forget that companies play a role in the social fabric of a nation. They are not just there to make a profit.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: Certainly a driver, to perform to the maximum, needs to feel comfortable - within the team, with the car.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: I know I have the support of my managers. But I questioned myself. I reflected on whether I can be suitable for the role of team principal.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: I think I will not follow all the races, even in 2020 I am already considering eventually skipping some of the racing in the last part of the season starting from Turkey.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: I know that leading Ferrari carries with it a high responsibility, but the pressure is more from the outside rather than internal.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: F1 has to be the pinnacle of motor sport in terms of technology and performance.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: An organisation is always a very dynamic situation, you always need to improve yourself and organisation is one of the tools you've got.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: If there are any decisions that need to be taken in some circumstances, they should be in the favour of the most experienced driver.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: For a driver in a Ferrari, anyway it is a lot of pressure, especially if you are a rookie.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: You need always to balance your tasks at the racetrack and at the factory. Still the factory is important where we are developing the car, preparing the cars.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: Because at the end, when you're responsible for an entire team, certainly the race event is important, but the entire... management of the entire team is even more important.
Author: Mattia Binotto

Quote: It's not a small thing, it's a pandemic, but economically we should not be in this position that we are this fragile as an industry. We don't go racing for three months and we are on the verge of collapsing, which is amazing.
Author: Guenther Steiner

Quote: I'm not an actor, I'm not good looking. It's not what I do, and I don't want to be one. Maybe if I watched myself I would then try to be one.
Author: Guenther Steiner

Quote: I think we can say our business plan worked even if a lot of people questioned if it could work beforehand and said we would be just like one of the other ones who came in in the last years.
Author: Guenther Steiner

Quote: Every team should have the chance to go on the podium, that would make it interesting. I believe that.
Author: Guenther Steiner

Quote: I learned English in a pub. I didn't learn it in school.
Author: Guenther Steiner

Quote: You are always chasing yourself, if you have testing sessions you test it out then but it's also a thing of growing a team.
Author: Guenther Steiner

Quote: I didn't speak English when I had my first job in motorsports.
Author: Guenther Steiner

Quote: If you run a business, and I see F1 as a business, if you have to go back every five weeks saying 'oh, I need another two million', it gets old pretty quick. Then the trust is lost.
Author: Guenther Steiner

Quote: I'm no good at acting. I don't want to do that, and I don't need to do that in life.
Author: Guenther Steiner

Quote: I think as a team we do OK with this because we are new and we need the drivers so we appreciate more if they do good for us than an established team, because you know it all and you know this environment here, it's like 'it cannot be me, it must be the driver'.
Author: Guenther Steiner
